summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Nego's new features: Talent Media Manager with Free/Premium tabs and Gift Coins feature. Both features are fully functional and correctly implemented.
critical_code_review_comments: MediaManager.tsx: Correctly implements Free/Premium tabs with data-testid attributes (media-tab-free, media-tab-premium, upload-media-button, upload-media-modal)
MediaManager.tsx: Tab switching updates upload button text ('Upload Free' vs 'Upload Premium') and info box descriptions
MediaManager.tsx: Upload modal includes file validation (10MB max, images/videos only), premium toggle, and unlock price input
GiftCoins.tsx: Correctly implements gift modal with data-testid attributes (gift-coins-button, gift-coins-modal, send-gift-button)
GiftCoins.tsx: Preset amounts (100, 500, 1000, 2500) work correctly with selection highlighting
GiftCoins.tsx: Custom amount input validates minimum (100 coins) with error message
GiftCoins.tsx: Insufficient balance warning displays correctly with 'Top Up' button and exact coins needed
TalentProfileClient.tsx: Gift Coins button only shows for logged-in clients (currentUser.role === 'client')
TalentDashboardClient.tsx: MediaManager component correctly integrated in Gallery tab
seed_data_creation: Created new talent user test_talent_625366@nego.test for testing Media Manager
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working. Media Manager has Free/Premium tabs with upload functionality. Gift Coins feature shows for clients on talent profiles with preset amounts, custom input, and balance validation. Note: The gifts table needs to be created by running supabase_media_gifting.sql for gift transactions to persist.

verified_working.media_manager_component: ✓ data-testid='media-manager' present on Talent Dashboard Gallery tab
verified_working.media_free_tab: ✓ data-testid='media-tab-free' - green button, shows 'Free content is visible to everyone'
verified_working.media_premium_tab: ✓ data-testid='media-tab-premium' - amber gradient with crown icon, shows 'Premium content is locked'
verified_working.media_tab_switching: ✓ Tabs switch correctly, upload button text updates ('Upload Free' vs 'Upload Premium')
verified_working.media_upload_modal: ✓ data-testid='upload-media-modal' - file upload area, premium toggle, unlock price input
verified_working.gift_coins_button: ✓ data-testid='gift-coins-button' - amber gradient button in talent profile header
verified_working.gift_coins_visibility: ✓ Only shows for logged-in clients (not for talents viewing their own profile)
verified_working.gift_coins_modal: ✓ data-testid='gift-coins-modal' - opens when clicking gift button
verified_working.gift_preset_amounts: ✓ 100, 500, 1000, 2500 preset buttons work with selection highlighting
verified_working.gift_custom_amount: ✓ Custom amount input with minimum 100 validation
verified_working.gift_min_validation: ✓ Shows 'Minimum gift is 100 coins' when amount < 100
verified_working.gift_insufficient_balance: ✓ Shows warning with exact coins needed and 'Top Up' button when amount > balance
